mapper.insert: INSERT INTO brand (brand_name, brand_phone, brand_account, brand_bank) VALUES (#{brandName}, #{brandPhone}, #{brandAccount}, #{brandBank});
mapper.select: SELECT brand_name, brand_phone, brand_account, brand_bank FROM brand JOIN product_name USING(brand_code) ORDER BY brand_code
SELECT brand_name, brand_phone, brand_account, brand_bank FROM brand JOIN product_name USING(brand_code) WHERE brand_code = #{brandCode} ORDER BY brand_code
SELECT brand_code, brand_name FROM brand ORDER BY brand_code
